item.description: Special offering for Karaoke on a Friday night at the Rosebud, if Sunday and Tuesday Nights are not a possibility for you to get out join us Friday July 20th and experience Karaoke at the Rosebud, what a great time we have, great singers, great fun, great food and just an overall great experience. find us on FB at ROSEBUDKARAOKE SOMERVILLE and add us as a friend. WE are also giving away a white water river trip for 2. One lucky singers name will be drawn that night for the trip. The trip is courtesy of Geary's Brewing and River Drivers in Maine. So come join us for all the fun and a chance at a great prize.
item.name: Special Friday Night Edition of Rosebud Karaoke
